base_query: Create a semantic mapping based on the Countries and Capitals datasets. Label the columns using the DBPedia ontology.
variations: Can you generate a semantic mapping of the Countries and Capitals datasets, ensuring the columns are labeled with the DBPedia ontology?
Using the DBPedia ontology, can you label the columns while creating a semantic mapping from the Countries and Capitals datasets?
Can you develop a semantic mapping of the Countries and Capitals datasets while incorporating the DBPedia ontology for column labeling?
I need a semantic mapping created from the Countries and Capitals datasets, with the columns appropriately labeled using the DBPedia ontology.
